title: Mini-Ep 138: Sad Hands Never
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 138: Sad Hands Never
itunes:subtitle: Kate recommends a cozy TV show and Doree’s got a new pandemic mindset. Then, listeners get deep into the world of fancy hand soaps, and they hear from someone wondering what to do with all the pre-shelter-in-place clothes no one wears anymore.&nbsp...
description:
Kate recommends a cozy TV show and Doree’s got a new pandemic mindset. Then, listeners get deep into the world of fancy hand soaps, and they hear from someone wondering what to do with all the pre-shelter-in-place clothes no one wears anymore. 


Activity of the Day: Wash your hands!


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com. For info on office hours, click here.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

  • MOLEKULE - For 10% off your first order, visit molekule.com and enter FOREVER35 at checkout.
  • CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.


Theme music by Riot.
